Translations.Text: (he nabee!) kya hamane tumhaare lie tumhaara vaksh (seena) nahin khol diya
aur tumhaara bojh nahin utaar diya
jisane tumhaaree peeth tod dee thee
aur tumhaaree charcha ko ooncha kar diya
nishchay kathinaee ke saath aasaanee bhee hai
nishchay kathinaee ke saath aasaanee bhee hai
atah, jab avasar mile, jo aaraadhana mein prayaas karo
aur apane paalanahaar kee or dhyaanamagn ho jao
injeer tatha zaitoon kee shapath
evan "toore seeneen" kee shapath
aur is shaanti ke nagar kee shapath
hamane inasaan ko manohar roop mein paida kiya hai
phir use sabase neeche gira diya
parantu, jo eemaan laaye tatha sadaachaar kiye, unake lie aisa badala hai, jo kabhee samaapt nahin hoga
phir (tum maanav jaati) pratiphal (badale) ke din ko kyon jhuthalaate ho
kya allaah sab adhikaariyon se badh kar adhikaaree nahin hai
apane paalanahaar ke naam se padh, jisane paida kiya
jis ne manushy ko rakt ko lothade se paida kiya
padh, aur tera paalanahaar bada daya vaala hai
jis ne lekhanee ke dvaara gyaan sikhaaya
insaan ko usaka gyaan diya jis ko vah nahin jaanata tha
vaastav mein, insaan sarakashee karata hai
isalie ki vah svayan ko nishchint (dhanavaan) samajhata hai
nihsandeh, phir tere paalanahaar kee or palat kar jaana hai
kya tumane use dekha jo rokata hai
ek bhakt ko, jab vah namaaz ada kare
bhala dekho to, yadi vah seedhe maarg par ho
ya allaah se darane ka aadesh deta ho
aur dekho to, yadi usane jhuthalaaya tatha munh phera ho
kya vah nahin jaanata ki allaah use dekh raha hai
nishchay yadi vah nahin rukata, to ham use maathe ke bal ghasetenge
jhoothe aur paapee maathe ke bal
to vah apanee sabha ko bula le
ham bhee narak ke farishton ko bulaayenge
(he bhakt) kadaapi usakee baat na suno tatha sajda karo aur mere sameep ho jao
nihsandeh, hamane us (quraan) ko lailatul qadr (sammaanit raatri) mein utaara
aur tum kya jaano ki vah lailatul qadr (sammaanit raatri) kya hai
lailatul qadr (sammaanit raatri) hazaar maas se uttam hai
usamen (har kaam ko poorn karane ke lie) farishte tatha roohî€¼ (jibreel) apane paalanahaar kee aagya se utarate hain
vah shaanti kee raatri hai, jo bhor hone tak rahatee hai
ahle kitaab ke kaafir aur mushrik log eemaan laane vaale nahin the jab tak ki unake paas khula pramaam na aa jaaye
arthaat allaah ka ek rasool, jo pavitr granth padhakar sunaaye
jisamen uchit aadesh hai
aur jin logon ko granth diye gaye, unhonne is khule pramaan ke aa jaane ke pashchaat hee matabhed kiya
aur unhen keval yahee aadesh diya gaya tha ki ve dharm ko shudhd rakhen aur sabako taj kar keval allaah kee upaasana karen, namaaz ada karen aur zakaat den aur yahee shaasht dharm hai
nihsandeh, jo log ahle kitaab mein se kaafir ho gaye tatha mushrik (mishranavaadee), to ve sada narak kee aag mein rahenge aur vahee dushtatam jan hain
jo log eemaan laaye tatha sadaachaar karate rahe, to vahee sarvashreshth jan hain

unaka pratiphal unake paalanahaar kee or se sada rahane vaale baag hain. jinake neeche naharen bahatee hongee. ve unamen sada nivaas karenge. allaah unase prasann hua aur ve allaah se prasann hue. ye usake lie hai, jo apane paalanahaar se dara
jab dharatee ko pooree tarah jhanjhod diya jaayega
tatha bhoomi apane bojh baahar nikaal degee
aur insaan kahega ki ise kya ho gaya
us din vah apanee sabhee soochanaayen varnan kar degee
kyonki tere paalanahaar ne use yahee aadesh diya hai
us din log titar-bitar hokar aayenge, taaki ve apane karmon ko dekh len
to jisane ek kan ke baraabar bhee puny kiya hoga, use dekh lega
aur jisane ek kan ke baraabar bhee bura kiya hoga, use dekh lega
un ghodon kee shapath, jo daudakar haanph jaate hain
phir pattharon par taap maarakar chingaariyaan nikaalane vaalon kee shapath
phir praatah kaal mein dhaava bolane vaalon kee shapath
jo dhool udaate hain
phir sena ke beech ghus jaate hain
vaastav mein, insaan apane paalanahaar ka bada krtaghn (naashukara) hai
nishchit roop se, vah isapar svayan saakshee (gavaah) hai
vah dhan ka bada premee hai
